text: Al Albert is a former sportscaster. He is the brother of sportscasters Marv and Steve, and is the uncle of Kenny Albert. He worked for USA calling MLB, NBA, NHL, and boxing. He called games for the New York Nets, Denver Nuggets, Indiana Pacers, and the New York Islanders.International Boxing Hall of Fame/BWAA Awards ==References== Category:National Hockey League broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:American Basketball Association announcers Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Jewish American sportspeople Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Ohio University alumni Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn
title: Al Albert
